Module ubuntu¶

  • License: Apache 2.0
  • Version: 0.3.2
  • Author: Inmanta <code@inmanta.com>

Handlers¶

class ubuntu.UbuntuService¶
A handler for services on systems that use upstart
  • Handler name ubuntu_service
  • Handler for entity std::Service
